description: Explore Oracle's innovative role in open source contributions and blockchain adoption, highlighting its involvement in Java, MySQL, and distributed ledger technology (DLT) to drive digital transformation and industry influence.
keywords: Oracle, open source, blockchain, Java, MySQL, OpenJDK, Oracle Blockchain Platform, cloud computing, distributed ledger technology, digital transformation, Kubernetes, Terraform, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
title: Oracle's Pioneering Role in Open Source and Blockchain
